com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Class LexiconFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon.LexiconFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LexicalEntryFactory, Lexicon, PosTaggerLexicon, NeedsTalismaneSession, Serializable

    public class LexiconFile
extends Object
implements PosTaggerLexicon, Serializable, NeedsTalismaneSession, LexicalEntryFactory

    A lexicon contained in a text file with one line per entry.

    All empty lines are lines starting with a # will be ignored.

    All other lines are assumed to be lexicon entries, to be interpreted using the provided LexiconEntryReader

    If the posTagMapper is null, assumes that the lexical entry categories are already set to pos-tag codes for the current posTagSet.

    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setExclusions

        public void setExclusions(List<List<String>> exclusions)
        A list of specific items to exclude when loading the lexicon. Each internal list is a list of attributes, all of which must match for the provided getExclusionAttributes() for the entry to get excluded.
